Headline: #79 79th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 79th/Halsted
ShortDescription: EB 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Halsted, 81st, Vincennes, & 79th, due to street blockage near 79th/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Halsted, 81st, Vincennes, & 79th, due to street blockage near 79th/Halsted.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Northbound Reroute near 79th/Halsted

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Terminal, Emerald, 81st, & Vincennes, due to street blockage near 79th/Halsted.
